Noutăți Fundația Alumni UAIC și facultăț: UAIC Alumni Foundation and faculties News
Stimați absolvenți, Bine ați venit pe pa: Dear graduates, Welcome to the official website of the Alumni community of Alexandru Ioan Cuza University in Iaşi (UAIC).
Ești absolvent UAIC și vrei să te înscri: Are you an UAIC graduate and want to join the UAIC Alumni community? Complete the form below. This will make it easier for us to keep in touch with you.
